Text: Two years ago, Monarch, another British carrier and tour operator, collapsed, leaving more than 100,000 passengers stranded abroad and forcing the government to step in to bring them home.
Cause: Two years ago, Monarch, another British carrier and tour operator, collapsed
Effect: leaving more than 100,000 passengers stranded abroad and forcing the government to step in to bring them home.
Sentence: <e1>Two years ago, Monarch, another British carrier and tour operator, collapsed</e1>, <e2>leaving more than 100,000 passengers stranded abroad and forcing the government to step in to bring them home.</e2>
